description:
Ferric Chloride 40%

Ferric Chloride 40% • CAS 7705-08-0

Strength: 40% • Size: 1 Gallon

Specifications:
- Formula: FeCl3
- Molecular weight: 162.21
- Appearance: Dark brown liquid, metallic luster, fuming
- Solubility: Highly water soluble, compatible with alcohols
- Specific gravity: 1.43
- Boiling point: 280
- Melting point: 37

Common applications: Industrial, Environmental, Wastewater.

Documentation: SDS available.

Safety: Use appropriate PPE and follow the SDS and label directions.
title: Alliance Chemical Ferric Chloride 40% 1 Gallon
